column1: As this toll road runs along hills which don't have access to electricity
column2: PT Jasa Marga Tbk installs many solar street lights to brighten the road in the night. Along KM 104 - 105
column3: many solar street lights are installed on the two lanes of the road. Nevertheless
column4: there are also some electric street lights along the toll road
column5: such as around KM 91 and KM 95.
